content.text:
# Stoners Reeking Havoc

Stoners Reeking Havoc is the Kottonmouth Kings' first EP-CD released on February 24, 1998.  In a 2015 interview with Johnny Richter, he stated that he was a member of the group at the time of the EP's release but wasn't on it due to personal issues with another member of the group.
